data.title: Atlantic Wharf
data.meta_description: Atlantic Wharf is Boston’s first green skyscraper and is a recipient of the 2012 ULI Global Awards for Excellence. With frontage on both the Rose Kennedy Greenway and historic Boston Harbor, the property includes a dramatic office tower, creative office space, dynamic retail and public spaces, residential units, a parking garage, and a waterfront plaza.
data.text: “Our new office at 290 Congress Street will provide our employees and our business with the kind of modern, engaging and efficient space that will allow us to develop the optimal work environment for the future. We’re excited to welcome employees to this dynamic new space and are delighted to reinforce our engagement with, and commitment to, this world-class city.”
